title: James McBryer
text:
James McBryer was a Scottish amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="left%20back">left back</a> who appeared in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>.
Personal life.
McBryer studied to be an <a href="engineer">engineer</a>. He was a volunteer with the <a href="British%20Red%20Cross">British Red Cross</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a> and also served as a <a href="Motorboat">motor boat</a> engineer in <a href="Basra%2C%20Iraq">Basra, Iraq</a>.
